name: Beat the Bully
description:
Built in Unity

In a time where bullying is rampant. We decided to attempt to make a game to teach kids about how to deal with bullying.

Beat the Bully is a CO-OP puzzle platformer where two people control either the boy or the girl. Players have to work together to get past the bullies and get to the teacher.

Controls:

Can be found in the game. We added both controller and keyboard support.
